## A. Approvals obtained by the Company
1. Letter dated May 03, 2015 issued under the Employee Provident Fund and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952 for allotment of code bearing no. UPLKO1057695 to the Company.
2. Implementation letter issued on March 01, 2015 under the Employees' State Insurance Act, 1948 to the Company, the company was allotted with the code no. 30000617680001099.
